PerfectNetExp.abs: 葡萄弹（Grapeshot）由许多小圆球(通常为铁丸)组成的炮弹，欧洲于18世纪至19世纪使用，主要用作杀伤武器。此名称由其组合铁球 …
再次使用礼物，拿下龙群蔽空，火焰爆发，霰散弹(Grapeshot)和未送出得礼物。　　卡恩给我散弹和火焰爆发。

means.word_mean: 1. a cluster of small projectiles fired together from a cannon to produce a hail of shot

auth_sentence.content: To Percy Bysshe Shelley, however, these fragile devices were as dangerous to the established order as Napoleon's grapeshot.
